platforms.platform_text: A public space to discover and run metabolomics tools

platform.summary: A community driven metabolomics Galaxy service
comments: The public server is hosted by the UseGalaxy.eu team.
user_support: If there is something that should be added, please let us know on [Gitter](https://gitter.im/usegalaxy-eu/Lobby).
sponsors: The [Freiburg Galaxy Team](https://usegalaxy-eu.github.io/freiburg/) but also collectively by groups and individuals from across Europe
